name: Flood Escape!
description:
Welcome to Flood escape your main objective is to collect all the keys and reach the button before the pink acid reaches you

Controls
Player 1: Left and right to move, Up to jump, Space for lasers
Player 2: A and D to move, W to jump, left shift for lasers
Wall jump: jump on to a wall and hold the directional button so you stay there, then quickly swap to the up button and repeat

Menu Buttons 
Start: Begins the game from Level 1
P (Practice): Play the game without the flood
S (Skip): skips to last level (used for debug)
T (Tutorial): a few demo levels without the flood to help you learn the controls
VS (Multiplayer): Play flood escape with a friend in this mode
Credits: View who made the game
